channel.title: Easy problem to fix ^.^

item.title: Easy problem to fix ^.^
item.dc:creator: @I_am_beast I am beast
item.description:
@I_am_beast wrote:

I need to make a command that checks how many tickets I have, then gives me pk points for the tickets, and takes them away. I have this command that I DID NOT make.

if (playerCommand.startsWith("exchange")) { int hasitem = 1; if (!c.getItems().playerHasItem(2996, hasitem)) { c.sendMessage("You don't have any tickets!"); return; } c.pkPoints += 10; c.getItems().deleteItem(2996, 1); }

I want it to check how many tickets I have, and give me the correct amount of points for it. Thanks.

Read full topic
